Text: Re Virginia Natural GasColumbia Gas Cc Here is the information that I have on the contracts below K Pipe Expiration Charge Type Amount Volume TCO Storage Demand TCO Storage Demand Storage Capacity TCO Storage Demand TCO No information Available TCO Storage Capacity TCO Storage Capacity sg Forwarded by Steve GillespieCorpEnron on PM Chris CT PM To Steve NRON cc Subject Re Virginia Natural GasColumbia Gas Would you get me all the contract details on this capacity and email it to me thanks Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Victor Lamadrid PM To Angel NRON Chris CT Scott NRON Steve NRON cc Joann NRON Alvin nron Katherine L CT Brenda H CT Sherry CT Subject Re Virginia Natural GasColumbia Gas Angel Steve Gillespie is managing the day to day operations of the VNG asset mgt deal for our logistics group Please include him with your queries It is my understanding that we are agents for all of their contracts and we pay all their transport costs In turn we invoice them and they reimburse us for that transport Chris Germany and Scott Goodell in the Transportation Trading Group are responsible for setting these contracts in UNIFY All of these contracts in question are storage or transportation tied to storage ChrisScott please set up the valid contracts below in UNIFY as soon as possibleContract is terminated effective If you have any questions please let us know Victor Angel NRON AM To Joann NRON Alvin nron cc Victor CT Katherine L CT Brenda H CT Sherry CT Subject Virginia Natural GasColumbia Gas Hi Joann and Alvin As you know effective October ENA became agent for Virginia Natural Gas Here in Volume Management as I try to load beginning balances and actualize volumes so that I can pay VNGs transportation charges for it appears that the following contracts for VNGCgas are not in Unify Contract Number Type FSSMaster Contract x LNG Storage SST ISS FSS FSS I would appreciate any help you can give me in getting these contracts in Unify as soon as possible If you have any questions or need additional information please let me know Thanks Angel

Dayton SST Contract for Summer Season to Operational note on DPL Columbia Gas SST contract for April The total contract volume will decrease from to on April st By the terms of the deal Dayton will take what they need on a daily basis and Enron will have the remainder of the contract MDQ Assuming normal system demand at DPL Enron should have from to of this SST contract during the month of April ECONOMIC NOTE Enron will not have to pay any variable cost demand or commodity to Dayton until the cumulative usage of the SST contract by DPL and Enron reaches dth Based on the historical data compiled by Columbia during the course of the asset management deal this dth figure will not be hit until sometime in June or early July It is to our advantage to fill this contract up to the max allowed by DPL on a daily basis until this figure comes into play It is an immediate saving of the commodity charge which will be about I can provide a copy of the actual contract for your review upon request sg

Penalty Summary VNG Columbia Gas Transmission TCO November Cc Level Penalty Summary Dates of Flow November Contract Involved ENA delivered to Hopewell on this contract for dates below VNG needed volume below to balance at gate attempted to pull and contract was overrun VNG took from storage result of both ENA and VNG was overrun VNG took from storage result of both ENA and VNG was overrun VNG took from storage result of both ENA and VNG was overrun VNG took from storage result of both ENA and VNG was overrun Total Overrun ENA delivered back into the VNG storage as payback when VNG pulled all and overran the contract overrun Total Overrun TFE Total Firm Entitlement Penalty Total Overrun on both contracts and penalty due to market area restrictions when overrun occurred Enron NA was never notified by TCO of any penalty overrun on VNG contract or pipeline OFO situation during the November time period Denise Dotson was notified by VNG gas control on the morning of November th about the overrun situation above The VNG gas control experienced the problem but did not notify Enron or AGL until Monday morning Enron immediately placed ranking system in Navigator to make VNG first priority This was completed Monday afternoon November th On Tuesday morning Denise Dotson once again called Enron stating that the previous night VNG attempted to pull maximum volumes from storage contracts only to overrun contract due to ENA nominations to other delivery points Joann Collins called her Columbia team and was told that the ranking was not applicable after the last confirmation cycle on any gas day with nonotice contracts Ranking has zero effect with the late night schedulers Enron dropped the Hopewell nomination from the VNG contracts effective Forwarded by Steve GillespieCorpEnron on PM Denise Dotson on PM To cc Subject Columbia Gas Transmission TCO penalties November High Priority I received a call this afternoon from the VNG TCO Account Manager VNG incurred pipeline overrun charges from Nov th st TCO stated ENA used VNG capacity to deliver to other markets Hopewell Power Plant TCO notified Enron and VNG of the allocation problem during the month of November Although TCO assured Enron that the predetermined allocation methodology would be corrected to allow VNG rights to pull under the contract first however based on the conversation with TCO corrections were not made Therefore VNG incurred overrun charges under the VNG contract dth totaling Please notify pipeline to reconcile and provide AGLES with pipeline invoices for November ENA is responsible for all penalties associated with this transaction

FormosoSportand Chris I am not in the loop on the Formosa deal sg Forwarded by Steve GillespieCorpEnron on AM Elizabeth L CT AM To Susan W CT Steve NRON cc Charles nron Linda J CT Subject FormosoSport Can you please help Client Services out on the pricing for Formosa PlasticsSport Pipelline Forwarded by Elizabeth L HernandezHOUECT on AM From Charles Jacobs ENRON AM To Elizabeth L CT cc Linda J CT Subject FormosoSport Elizabeth Can you tell us if the terms of the Formosa PlasticsSport Pipeline deals have changed The terms USED to be Formosa got the first day deal Sport deal got the next day and Sport deal took the swing There have been new deals set up in Sitara for November production that dont mirror that Formosa deal starts on day what happened to days and gets the first day Sport deal covers days but the prices are tiered to include what looks like Formosas volume Sport deal covers the rest of the month but the prices dont mirror the first days prices Do you see a problem here Help Chuck

Storage TransferWhat month and date is this effective sg Forwarded by Steve GillespieCorpEnron on PM Chris CT PM To cc Steve NRON Victor CT Scott NRON Angie NRON Subject Storage Transfer Please transfer the storage balance of dth from contract to VNG contract Thanks

never notified by TCO of any penalty overrun on VNG contract or pipeline OFO situation during the November time period Denise Dotson was notified by VNG gas control on the morning of November th about GillespieCorpEnron on PM Denise Dotson on PM To cc Subject Columbia Gas Transmission TCO penalties November High Priority I received a call this afternoon from the VNG TCO Account Manager VNG incurred pipeline overrun charges from Nov th st TCO stated ENA used VNG capacity to deliver to other markets Hopewell Power Plant TCO notified Enron and VNG of the allocation problem during the month of November Although TCO assured Enron that the predetermined allocation methodology would be corrected to allow VNG rights to pull under the contract first however based on the conversation with TCO corrections were not made Therefore VNG incurred overrun charges under the VNG contract dth totaling Please notify pipeline to reconcile and provide AGLES with pipeline invoices for November ENA is responsible for all penalties associated with this transaction

FWChris If youre in a position to send Tim Riordan a resume and mention my name Tim will hand walk it to Maria Hooper the person who will be hiring the position Tim is expecting your inquiry Tims email address is Let me know if I can get you any specific information and Ill do my best sg Original Message From Riordan Tim F ENRON Sent Monday October AM To Gillespie Steve Subject RE Champions Why dont you just send the resume over and I will give it her Original Message From SMTP Sent Monday October AM To Riordan Tim F Cc Subject RE Champions Can you give me her number sg Original Message From Riordan Tim F ENRON Sent Monday October AM To Gillespie Steve Subject RE Champions I am going to go to champions on both days I just dont know when Marie wants to go Second I am not sure what the northeast trading position is The person you are talking about needs to talk to Maria Hooper to find out Original Message From Gillespie Steve SMTPSteve NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Riordan Tim F Subject Champions Tim What day were you thinking of going out to the clubSaturday or Sunday Question The northeast trading position you have open at Conoco what are you looking for with experience or background What will the individual be asked to do What will they be responsible for in other words I might have found you a perfect candidate sg This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE VNG TENN Contract Cc Chris we lost this contract in November sg Original Message From Fletcher Brenda H Sent Tuesday November PM To Gillespie Steve Cc Germany Chris Subject VNG TENN Contract Importance High Was any capacity released under this contract in November There is no deal number in Sitara with a demand fee for this contract for November forward Deal has IM Market East as the Agent If we need to pay a transport fee for this contract then a new deal needs to be set up Please let me know as soon as possible Thanks Brenda

FW VNG Update Original Message From Danna Crowther ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDannaCrowtherCdcrowtheaglresourcesEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Brian Debaun Gillespie Steve Subject VNG Update Daily Steve G Enronxls
VNG Columbia Gas Penalty for September Cc Sherry You can make the payment to Columbia Gas for the penalty of that occurred in September from the ENA IM ME TCO book sg

FW International Paper Invoice Address ChangePriscilla Have you faxed the Intl Paper invoice to Walter yet sg Original Message From Gillespie Steve Sent Wednesday October PM To Hamic Priscilla Subject International Paper Invoice Address Change Priscilla Here is a revised contact and address for the International Paper deal we discussed earlier Aaron Wakefield is the accountant in charge of paying this invoice The invoice should be sent to the plant manager Walter Smith Walter Smith fax International Paper attn Walter Smith PO Box Waverly VA sg
VNG October Manual Invoice Cc Priscilla Let me know when if youre available and well go over each item on the invoice to make sure it is correct sg

RE VNG Penalty for Cc Sherry The penalty on Day will be assigned to ENA IM ME TCO Book The penalty on Day will be split between the following books ENA IM VNG ENA IM ME TCO sg Original Message From Anastas Sherry Sent Thursday November AM To Gillespie Steve Subject VNG Penalty for Steve The penalties were assessed as follows Day mmbtu Day mmbtu Total The tolerance amount was mmbtu Please let me know if you need additional information Sherry

RE Louisville Gas ElectricDebra My contact said on the first page of the contract he would like cover checked not spot as it now appears That is the last revision requested and if you agree it should bring this deal to closure sg Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Monday October PM To Gillespie Steve Subject RE Louisville Gas Electric Tell them to submit language they would like to see and I will review it Have them email you and cc me dp Original Message From Gillespie Steve Sent Wednesday October PM To Perlingiere Debra Subject RE Louisville Gas Electric Debra My contact at LGE has requested the default pricing in the contract be switched from spot to some type of truecost verbiage His point was that if he is buying on a given day from Enron and ENA only delivers by the terms of the present contract Enron would be responsible for the spot cost of replacement gas or the gas daily average for that zone My contact points out that the market for gas when this purchase is to take place could be significantly higher or lower than gas daily and that is the cost they want to pay or receive Is something like this request possible sg Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Friday August PM To Gillespie Steve Subject Louisville Gas Electric FYI I have started negotiations with LGE however they have not resolved the issue of party names on their part I will keep you apprised of my progress dp Debra Perlingiere Enron North America Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas nron Fax
